app_descript:
App Name: Sandbox In Space

App Package Name: com.hookah.sandboxinspace

Brief: Unleash your cosmic creativity in "Sandbox in Space," a thrilling galaxy sandbox game that propels you to craft your own celestial scenarios. Imagine a universe brimming with diverse items ranging from sophisticated weaponry to dynamic ships and enigmatic allies. Encounter the challenge as you engage in a robust multiplayer environment, construct elaborate structures in a physics-driven sandbox, and vie for survival against notorious memes-turned-nextbots in a frightful space-themed playland.

  • üéÆ Multiplayer Mayhem: Team up with friends in online and offline modes for collaborative creativity and combative action. üåå
